typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SouthridgeCatalogRawOutput
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> FourthCoffeeActorsRaw
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieActor
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieOnlineMovieRaw
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> VanArsdelMovieRawOutput
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> VanArsdelActorsRawOutput
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> VanArsdelOnlineMoviesRawOutput
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput
SouthridgeCatalogRawOutput foldDown(unroll(actors),
	mapColumn(
		ActorName = actors.name,
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenForMultipleActors
SouthridgeCatalogDervivedCols select(mapColumn(
		ActorName,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = availabilityDate,
		Genre = genre,
		Rating = rating,
		TheatricalReleaseYear = releaseYear,
		RuntimeMinutes,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate = streamingAvailabilityDate,
		Title = title,
		SourceSystemMovieID = id,
		SouthridgeMovieID = id,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SouthridgeSelectNeededCols
FlattenForMultipleActors derive(RuntimeMinutes = toInteger(runtime),
		GlobalMovieID = uuid(),
		SourceSystemID = "southridge") ~> SouthridgeCatalogDervivedCols
FourthCoffeeMovieActor, FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw join(FourthCoffeeMovieActor@MovieID == FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMovieActorToMovie
JoinMovieActorToMovie, FourthCoffeeActorsRaw join(FourthCoffeeMovieActor@ActorID == FourthCoffeeActorsRaw@ActorID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMovieActorandMovietoActor
JoinMovieActorandMovietoActor, FourthCoffeeMovieOnlineMovieRaw join(FouthCoffeeMoviesRaw@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieOnlineMovieRaw@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInOnlineMovieID
JoinInOnlineMovieID derive(SourceSystemID = "fourthcoffee",
		GlobalMovieID = uuid()) ~> FourthCoffeeDervivedCols
VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput, VanArsdelActorsRawOutput join(VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput@ActorID == VanArsdelActorsRawOutput@ActorID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VanArsdelMovieActorToActor
VanArsdelMovieActorToActor, VanArsdelMovieRawOutput join(VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput@MovieID == VanArsdelMovieRawOutput@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VanArsdelJointoMovie
VanArsdelJointoMovie, VanArsdelOnlineMoviesRawOutput join(VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput@MovieID == VanArsdelOnlineMoviesRawOutput@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> VanArsdelJointoOnlineMovie
VanArsdelJointoOnlineMovie derive(SourceSystemID = "vanarsdel",
		GlobalMovieID = uuid()) ~> VanArsdelDerivedCols
FourthCoffeeDervivedCols select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemMovieID = FourthCoffeeMovieActor@MovieID,
		ActorID = FourthCoffeeMovieActor@ActorID,
		Title = MovieTitle,
		Genre = Category,
		Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = RunTimeMin,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = ReleaseDate,
		ActorName,
		Gender,
		SouthridgeMovieID = OnlineMovieID,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FourthCoffeeSelectNeededCols
VanArsdelDerivedCols select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemMovieID = VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput@MovieID,
		ActorID = VanArsdelMovieActorsRawOutput@ActorID,
		ActorName,
		Gender,
		Title = MovieTitle,
		Genre = Category,
		Rating,
		RuntimeMinutes = RunTimeMin,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate = ReleaseDate,
		SouthridgeMovieID = OnlineMovieID,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> VanArsdelSelectNeededCols
SouthridgeSelectNeededCols, FourthCoffeeSelectNeededCols, VanArsdelSelectNeededCols union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MovieCatalog.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		ActorName,
		PhysicalAvailabilityDate,
		Genre,
		Rating,
		TheatricalReleaseYear,
		RuntimeMinutes,
		StreamingAvailabilityDate,
		Title,
		SourceSystemMovieID,
		SouthridgeMovieID,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		ActorID,
		Gender
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CatalogCuratedSink

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VanArsdaleCustomer
SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput, SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput join(SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID == SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomertoAddy
JoinCustomertoAddy derive(sourcesystemid = "southridgedvd",
		MasterCreateDate = greatest(SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput@CreatedDate,SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@CreatedDate ),
		MasterUpdateDate = greatest(SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@UpdatedDate,SRDVDSalesCustomerAddressesOutput@UpdatedDate),
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnsForCustomerDim
SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput, SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource join(SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID == SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomerToAddyStreaming
JoinCustomerToAddyStreaming derive(sourcesystemid = "southridgestreaming",
		MasterCreateDate = greatest(SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource@CreatedDate, SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@CreatedDate),
		MasterUpdateDate = greatest(SRStreamingCustomerAddressRawSource@UpdatedDate, SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@UpdatedDate),
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnsForStreamingCustomers
DVDCustomerColSelect, StreamingCustomerColSelect, FourthCoffeeSelect, DerivedColumnVanArsdale union(byName: true)~> UnionCustomers
DerivedColumnsForCustomerDim select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SRDVDSalesCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate = MasterCreateDate,
		UpdatedDate = MasterUpdateDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DVDCustomerColSelect
DerivedColumnsForStreamingCustomers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SRStreamingCustomerRawOutput@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate = MasterCreateDate,
		UpdatedDate = MasterUpdateDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> StreamingCustomerColSelect
FourthCoffeeCustomer derive(sourcesystemid = "FourthCoffee",
		CreatedDateToTimeStamp = toTimestamp(concat(toString(CreatedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')," 00:00:00.0000000"),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'),
		UpdatedDateToTimeStamp = toTimestamp(concat(toString(UpdatedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')," 00:00:00.0000000"),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'),
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnFourthCoffee
VanArsdaleCustomer derive(sourcesystemid = "VanArsdale",
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumnVanArsdale
DerivedColumnFourthCoffee select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate = CreatedDateToTimeStamp,
		UpdatedDate = UpdatedDateToTimeStamp,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FourthCoffeeSelect
UnionCustomers sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerDim'],
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		sourcesystemid,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		GlobalCustomerID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WritetoCustomerDimCurated

source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		TotalCost as double,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> southridgdvdesalesorders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as double,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> southridgdvdesalesdetails
southridgdvdesalesdetails, southridgdvdesalesorders join(southridgdvdesalesdetails@OrderID == southridgdvdesalesorders@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 derive(sourcesystemid = "southridgedvd",
		salesorderGUID = uuid()) ~> sourceid
sourceid sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['southridgesalesdvdcurated.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> southridgedvdsalescurated

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		RentalCost as double,
		LateFee as double,
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		UpdatedDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeSourceFiles
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		ReturnDate as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		RentalCost as double,
		LateFee as double,
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsdaleSourceFiles
FourthCoffeeSourceFiles derive(SourceSystemNm = "FourthCoffee") ~> FourthCoffeeDerivedColumns
VanArsdaleSourceFiles derive(SourceSystemNm = "VanArsdale",
		CreatedDateNew = toDate(toString(CreatedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		UpdatedDateNew = toDate(toString(UpdatedDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> VanArsdaleDerivedColumns
FourthCoffeeDerivedColumns, VanArsdaleSelectColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionFourthCoffeeAndVanArsdaleTxn
VanArsdaleDerivedColumns select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		ReturnDate,
		RentalCost,
		LateFee,
		RewindFlag,
		SourceSystemNm,
		CreatedDate = CreatedDateNew,
		UpdatedDate = UpdatedDateNew
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VanArsdaleSelectColumns
UnionFourthCoffeeAndVanArsdaleTxn derive(RentalTxnGUID = uuid()) ~> DVDRentalGUID
DVDRentalGUID sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DVDRentalDetails.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DVDRentalTransactions
